name: Echoes of Helia
simpleDescription: Damage low-health enemies to trigger a cursed explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby foes

passives.name: Soul Siphon
passives.effects: Gain 35% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} dealt to champions as ''Soul Charges'', up to {{pp|80 + (250-80)/17*(x-1) for 20}}. {{tip|Healing}} or {{tip|shielding}} an allied champion ''(excluding yourself)'' consumes all charges to heal them equal to the consumed amount.
